prompt.description: The text prompt to generate an image from. Supports both English and Chinese text rendering.
prompt.title: Prompt

negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt to guide what not to include in the image.
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt

width.description: The width in pixels of the generated image.
width.title: Width

height.description: The height in pixels of the generated image.
height.title: Height

aspect_ratio.description: Predefined aspect ratio that overrides width/height if specified.
aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio

num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps for generation quality.
num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps

true_cfg_scale.description: The CFG scale for generation guidance.
true_cfg_scale.title: True Cfg Scale

language.description: Language for prompt optimization (English or Chinese).
language.title: Language
